items.title: US kills 14 in strikes on four alleged drug boats in Pacific
items.description: It is the latest in a series of attacks on boats the US says have been carrying drugs in both the Pacific and Caribbean.

items.title: Councils paying school transport costs for 470,000 pupils in England
items.description: Local authorities say the cost of providing school transport is becoming "financially unsustainable".

items.title: Watch Prunella Scales's memorable moments in Fawlty Towers
items.description: Fawlty Towers actress Prunella Scales, best known for playing hotel manager Sybil Fawlty, has died aged 93.

items.title: Bella Culley's sentence reduced to two years
items.description: The pregnant 19-year-old faces drugs charges in Georgia and is back in court on Monday.

items.title: England pick Ford at fly-half & Freeman at centre
items.description: George Ford starts at fly-half and Tommy Freeman at centre for England's opening autumn Test against Australia on Saturday.
